info.name: about:newtab for 33+
info.description:
hide newtab-search-container/newtab-intro-what/newtab-customize-button, and ...
隐藏无关元素/美化拨号界面/美化搜索框/缩略图/自动更换壁纸
可能是最完美的新标签页样式了?
about:newtab for 40+: https://userstyles.org/styles/117325/about-newtab-for-40

options.label: 悬停显示站点名
options.value:
.newtab-title{display: none !important;}/*网站名隐藏*/
.newtab-link:hover .newtab-title {display: block !important;}/*悬停显示站点名*/
